author: Xbox
description:
🔥Ember Knights: Heroes of the Nexus, the ultimate console edition including the base game and the Wrath of the Architect DLC, is now live on XBOX Series X|S and ROG Ally.🔥

In this fast-paced action rogue-lite, play as Ember Knights, the last spark of hope of a universe in turmoil. Praxis, the mad sorcerer, has syphoned the life out of the Ember Tree and fled through the four Prime Worlds spreading corruption in his path.

In solo or co-op (up to 4 players), use powerful weapons and skills to hack and slash deadly hordes, defeat epic bosses, free the decaying Prime Worlds and restore energy to the Ember Tree!

Ember Knights is an action rogue-lite for 1-4 players where you play as legendary knights, the last spark of hope against the mad sorcerer Praxis and his hordes of unwavering fiends.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/ember-knights-heroes-of-the-nexus-edition/9p8x48ggw98h

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

https://twitter.com/xbox 
https://www.facebook.com/
title: Ember Knights: Heroes of the Nexus Edition - Launch Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
Your games, wherever you want — ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X are now available. In Xbox’s debut launch trailer, “Dancing in the Dark,” we follow a man on a business trip in Tokyo. What at first seems like late-night gaming due to jetlag, we come to find is actually his outlet for connection. Using the ROG Xbox Ally, a gaming handheld with a console-inspired experience, he carves out time to play with his daughter back in California. This seamless link to her favorite games gives him the freedom to balance work and family, allowing him to be present for treasured father-daughter moments — even from the other side of the world.  
 
ROG Xbox Ally: powered by the AMD Ryzen™ Z2 A processor - balancing performance and power consumption to maximize battery life without sacrificing gameplay quality, with 16GB of RAM and 512GB of SSD storage.

ROG Xbox Ally X: features the AMD Ryzen™ AI Z2 Extreme processor - allowing us to bring new experiences to life including greater frames-per-second
title: ROG Xbox Ally – Dancing in the Dark – Launch Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
Voidtrain is coming to Xbox Play Anywhere and Xbox Game Pass on November 7. Become a crew member of an Interdimensional Express Train! Discover a new world full of mysterious creatures, enemies and places. Upgrade and customize your train, gather new materials and build better weapons. Play solo or online сo-op with up to 4 people.

Pre-order now: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/voidtrain/9NQMVR9WL9FW/0010

author: Xbox
description:
The ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox ALLY X are now available. 

The ROG Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X unlocks a gaming library that travels with you like never before. Download games from PC storefronts like Battle.net, Epic Game Store, Ubisoft, Steam, GOG.com and EA. With the unified game library you can find recently downloaded and played games in one place—easy and effortlessly accessible. Download PC games to play natively on the device. Console games can be streamed from the cloud or through remote play from your Xbox Series X|S console. Play where and how you want. This is an Xbox.
 
ROG Xbox Ally - Experience seamless PC gaming on the go. Powered by an ultra-efficient AMD Ryzen™ Z2 A processor, 16GB Memory and 516GB Storage, the ROG Xbox Ally is ready to game for longer. Peak efficiency at low wattages paired with a 60Wh battery gives you incredible battery efficiency.
 
ROG Xbox Ally X -The best of ASUS and Xbox together in one handheld. Powered by the all-new AMD Ryzen™ AI Z2 Extreme
title: ROG Xbox Ally -  Available Now Launch Trailer
